Author: its_yuru

Author: its_yuru
Content: # **CHAPTER 1 : Prologue**

Author: its_yuru
Content:
"1854 , News arrived back from the outside world upon the Bakufu in the northern hemisphere. They finally opening up , and forced to by the kaffirs of America. 
It hasnt been 20 years since the War of Reclamation , where we fight against the kaffir and jahils like Utsmaniah , britis , and frenchies for this kingdom's salvation under numerous sultanates it have. But now , with the same threat as the slit-eyed Qing with britis and Bafuku with Americans , it is only a matter of time before this kingdom is next."
-Ahmad Surowijoyo , the Sultan's Foreign Advisor.

Author: its_yuru
Content: by 1854 , Kingdom Al-Indunissya was having a massive threat towards its existent. 40 years prior , during the late stages of Napoleonic wars Britain invade whats remaining of the nation's ambitionist leader Jaffran Kalimuyo and his militarist. The nation was partitioned between Ottomans , British , Dutch , Portugueese and Spanish concession, leaving the actual state with pretty much no 100% control on every island. ( Sevres / Trianon but for Indo ).

Author: its_yuru
Content: With the resurgence of French revolutionary era style Republic after the 1848 Revolution trend back in Europe, Indonesian students who study abroad especially under the Koninklijk Nederlad Indie-Studien Committeite brought the ideas of Enlightenment back to the home country.

Author: its_yuru
Content: # 1855 : When the wind flew eastward

Author: its_yuru
Content: The Monarchy was currently under the House of Mataram-Wijaya, a house comprised of the Yogyakartans, Surakarta Sunans, Mangkunegara and Pakualaman Duchys that had been "Elected" in 1840

Author: its_yuru
Content: Indunissya or Indonesia had a system of a federated electoral base Monarchy ( like Malaysia). When the State first appeared it taken form of a Confederal Union between sultans to ally themselves agains Java, especially Mataram.

Author: its_yuru
Content: Because of that Monarchs must be switch between  Dynasties

Author: its_yuru
Content: First came the Banjarians, then Riauwiyahans, and currently now the Mataramans

Author: its_yuru
Content: The House of Mataram wasnt exactly friendly to Foreign idea and even their clerics who act as their advisor said its a Bid'ah or a Kafir invention

Author: its_yuru
Content: Lots persecution and even into Indonesian Christians who had bring back these idea in the first place. However that was about to change in 1855 when a couple of student from Pasranten Al-Hambari in Sunda Kelapa decide to "try" Applicating these ideas into a secret group known as "Komittee Wahid (1) "

Author: its_yuru
Content: But First, Lets talk about Indonesian Position by 1850's.

Author: its_yuru
Content: # 1850 : Loose term

Author: its_yuru
Content: By the start of the century, the nation already rocked by internal squables led by other kingdoms that deny Centralism and prefer their regional aristocracy.

Author: its_yuru
Content:
The so called "Kingdom" was more still of a confederation under a single constituent rotational monarch. Regional Aristocrats ( sunan, Adipati, Kyai, Imam, Sultan, even Monks and Priest ) had become the centre of power in the nation that holds Economic, Military, and Social dynamics. By 1850, the rise of enlightenment and intellectualism among the educated rose an alarm to the old system of aristocrats that this could led to their deposal and replacement with a new system that simply due to greed or religious reason wasn't fitting them.

Under Hamengkubowono V who had been previously ruling during the post Napoleonic era of Mataram, now had been trying to put down a fire of enlightenment and regional uprising as far as 1845. These include the Christ Republic, Riau succession crisis, and the Banjar Civil war.

Author: its_yuru
Content:
By March 1850, Enlightenment based lectures start spreading across the island of Java and Sumatra. These include lectures of "Islamic Enlightenment" And "Jihadi Modernism" that the Educated try to expand. 


From just Al-Hambari, it quickly spread out like a wild fire. Ideas of modern philosphy, expanded human rights, even abolitionism start to expand futher. They struck gold in Eastern Java, Jayakarta, Western Sumatra, Aceh, Makassar, and Northern Sulawesi. 

Although this progress was good, it often only happen to mostly Muslim school, specifically in Northern Sulawesi. This is because the Dutch, Portuguese, and the Spanish made monastery and sunday schools also had been teaching these kind of material ever since the Indies Civil War started in 1830.

Author: its_yuru
Content: In an effort to counter this, between April 1850 - January 1855 the goverment launch a massive smear campaign using clerics, Imams, and even Monks to discredit these "Bid'ah Ideas"

Author: its_yuru
Content:
Now since only like 1% is actually literate, this cause some massive setback to the movement. Figuratively numbers of those who support the Enlightenment started to dwindelling by 1852. Pressure from Imams and massive exorcism by Clerics led to the formation of a united front. 

This new front is dubbed "ÙƒØ³Ø© Ø¡Ù†  Ø±ÙØ± Ù…Ø³ Ø¬Ø±Ù‡" Or "Kasatuan Rafurmis Caraht"

Author: its_yuru
Content:
Funny enough, members of it mostly consisting of New Christian converts and Young Muslim Scholars who made up 67% of the total 220 membership at the start of 1853.

You might asking "how a country with sharia law let a non-muslim organization that big to have such a presence? "
The answer is simple, some of these people are Plantation Owners aka Slave owner, and they held a lot legitimacy and power under the goverment's protection. 

Now these arent like western Plantation, these Owners follow a strict code of sharia law towards the establishment of slavery that occur in this very Nation. 

This meant jizyah and Plantation tax is high enough, alongside that they cant use Muslim slaves, and forced to breed and rely on new other slaves borrowed from Philiphines, China, and Papua.

Author: its_yuru
Content: # 1855 : Winds

Author: its_yuru
Content:
Back again to 1855, the "Kasatuan Rafurmis Cahayt" Or KRC or Karachay was now really, really massive. 

It has lobbyied almost every person that has position within the goverment. Is it a success? No. 

Some of them outright deny, while others take the money and ran away. Their only salvagable ally was the rebellious "Second Christ Republic" In Minahasa and Halmahera, and the Military who saw the Crimean War and its effects. 

On June 1st, they had enough. For months they try to enter negotiation with Abdi Dalam and its Eunichs, but no avail. 

Worse, with Commodore perry's action in Edo, things went South pretty fast. Alongside that, the New Zealand Wars created even more anxiety as this also Increase British presence within the Pacific. Not much helping was the Opium wars happened in China, that severely destroy Indonesian Markets in the Canton and South China Sea region.

Author: its_yuru
Content: On 10:00 AM, mobs gather at the local mosque to protest and marching towards malioboro. Once arriving a massive shot erupted , triggering a massive riot.

Author: its_yuru
Content:
Sultan Hamengkubuwana V was then assasinated by her mistress 4 days later on June 5th, causing massive crisis including Succession, Economic ( since many guilds and Plantation holds their taxes because of the riots and start closing doors) and Social. 


This was known as the **"Krisis Dalem"**

Author: its_yuru
Content: For 5 years, Karachay and many other Public Figures had been trying both successfully or ended in failed attempt to drive the force of Reform towards the very structure and law of the Nation.

Author: its_yuru
Content: These demands we're collected in 1858 as **"Resah Oemat 19"**

Author: its_yuru
Content:
______________________________
**RESAH OEMAT 19** demands include :

>Formation of a sovereign national Diet

>Key Modernization of Military, Educational, Economic, and Foreign Institution. 

>Abiding the Law set by the British-Dutch cohersed "Act of Kindness and Minority of 1840"

>Moderate Abolition of Slavery under the law that God Created all men Equal. 

>Creation of a Non-Aristocratic, Non-Military, and Non-Religious title of Governance modelled after Great Britain, France, and German Confederation. 

>Creation of Seperate diet for Sultans with Civillian Governance oversight
______________________________

Author: its_yuru
Content: These Demands were to be filled by the Aristocracy as late as 1859

Author: its_yuru
Content:
Meanwhile, amidst the crisis, a multi-state Civil war across the sultanates cant be averted including the Christ Republic Declaration of Common sovereignty from the Govenerate of Minahasa. 


Christian rebellions also pop up in Batak Region in Northern Sumatra, Kutai border attacks on Banjar with French support, and Reformist conducting assimetrical warfare both psychologically and Environmental warfare.

Author: its_yuru
Content: Finally in **April 1859** , Hamengkubuwana VI and Pakubuwana VII and VIII alongside their Mataram Viceroy Ilham Samabahran agrees and Declares a new Governance and even a Small Constitution.

Author: its_yuru
Content: # **CHAPTER 2 : POWDER KEG**

Author: its_yuru
Content: By **1860** , the New Goverment dubbed **"Pemerintahan Oemat Sejahtera"** start acting on their promise and demands , crucially was the Modernization

Author: its_yuru
Content:
First was the creation of "Mandat Indostreial 1860". This Mandate was created to push the build up of mid-sized manufacturing tenures and guilds across the island of Java, Southern Sulawesi and Southern Sumatra.

Now this mandate is very controversial at best. What it wants is that as I said before the creation of Mid-sized Industry and Manufacturing tenures / Guilds. However, some of the current Mid-sized Merchant guilds and small sized Shops wasnt ready yet to integrate. Another problem came with land, since the Nation is pretty much under the mercy of Plantation owners and the demand for agriculture crops, especially as an alternative to the now unstable Qing Dynasty.

Author: its_yuru
Content:
Second, was the series of buyout of old British and Prussian stockpile through France , Spain and the Ottoman for percussion cap musket. 
Specifically the Dreise Needle model from Prussia. 

Indonesia also start restructured its military into the "Royal Armed Forces" In 1861 or Angkatan Perang Karadjaan" With its size started at 250.000 followed by the use of 1.000.000 militia conscripts from villages.

Author: its_yuru
Content: Main problem relays back to the very doctrine the military had been set for decades

Author: its_yuru
Content: which were the usage of conscripts , in this case village conscripts. These conscripts or Irregulars were armed only with spears, bow, sometimes old muskets that are heavy.

Author: its_yuru
Content: The Princes also became a problem since they are the one who usually have full command of the irregulars. The Goverment has tried to negotiate a change inside the military structure where instead of princes its lieutenants, kapitans, and serjan.

Author: its_yuru
Content: The Military Reform brought new equipments. These include the legendary Gatlin Gun and Spencers Repeater which became part of the new Indonesian military line Up

Author: its_yuru
Content: One such Example was Batallion 12th of the Guardsmen Jayakarta

Author: its_yuru
Content:
The line up consist of 
>2 company of Infantry 
>4 company of assaulter ( equipped with repeaters modified to fit bayonet) 
>2 Artilerry team
